inclusion.criterion: Raising PSA after prior treatment failure of localized prostate cancer
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Has a histological confirmed non-metastatic cancer of the prostate (Gleason graded) based on the most current biopsy
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Has a screening testosterone within normal range (≥1.5 ng/mL)
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Has Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group score of ≤2
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Bone scan or CT scan report documenting no evidence of metastasis to the bone or internal organs
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Life expectancy of at least 15 months
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Taken hormone therapy in the last 6 months prior to entering this study
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Being treated with 5-alpha reductase inhibitor at time of enrolment and remained on a stable dose throughout the trial
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Has a history of severe uncontrolled asthma, anaphylactic reactions, or severe urticaria and/or angioedema
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Has hypersensitivity towards any component of the study drug
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Has a previous history or presence of another malignancy other than prostate cancer or treated squamous/basal cell carcinoma of the skin within the last five years
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Has abnormal laboratory results which in the judgement of the Investigator would affect the patient's health or the outcome of the trial
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Has a clinically significant medical condition (other than prostate cancer) including but not limited to; renal, haematological, gastrointestinal, endocrine, cardiac, neurological or psychiatric disease and alcohol or drug abuse or any other condition which may affect the patient's health or the outcome of the trial as judged by the Investigator
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Has an intellectual incapacity or language barriers precluding adequate understanding or co-operation
exclusion.label: unknown
